entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ross River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Ice fog patches dissipating early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
